content: crescent moon motif materials hook g-4 25mm tapestry needle scissors yarn/yardage yarn bee soft secret in denim/color 1 15y and butter/color 2 2y iron spray starch blocking set up gauge width 2in per 4 double_crochet row height 2in per 10 double_crochet sts terms mc magic_ring c/o cast on f/o fasten_off st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet htc half triple crochet tc triple crochet notes - written in us terms - beginning chain 3 counts as a double_crochet - parts within ** are repeated - row-row working side to side - round-round working in rounds/circular pattern note use denim/color 1 round 1 mc chain 3 11 double_crochet in the circle join with slip_stitch 12 round 2 chain 3 1 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in each st join with slip_stitch 24 note use butter/color 2 use invisible join do not cut denim/color 1 this round has many st changes round 3 slip_stitch to next st 1sc in the next 1sc 1hdc in the next 2hdc in the next 1hdc 1dc in next 2dc in next 1dc 1htc in next 2htc in next 1htc 1tc in next 3tc in next note from here reverse the instructions to decrease round 3 cont d 1tc 1htc in next 2htc in next 1htc 1dc in next 2dc in next 1dc 1hdc in next 2hdc in next 1hdc 1sc in next 1sc in next slip_stitch to next st chain 1 and c/o 33 note pick up denim/color 1 from the invisible join row 4 slip_stitch into the 1st single_crochet of the previous round of butter/color 1 chain 3 counts as 1dc *2dc chain 2 2dc in next corner 1dc in next 1hdc in next 2 sts 1sc in next 3 sts 1hdc in next 2 sts 1dc in next * x3 on the last repeat you will slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 instead of the last 1dc 60 row 5 chain 3 double_crochet in each st in the corner 2dc chain 2 2dc continue 1dc in each st until the next corner and repeat 2dc chain 2 2dc repeat around and the slip_stitch to top of beginning chain 3 f/o 76 final notes - with right side down spray a light mist of starch cover with a piece of fabric and lightly iron uncover and block motif until it dries completely - when weaving in butter/color 2 ends i thread the ends through the front of the single_crochet sts to create more definition on the points of the moon
